ost_step.2: Each teacher has 2 lessons per day, so they have 16 lessons per day.
ost_step.3: They use the whiteboard in each lesson, so in a day they use it 16 x 2 = 32 times.

direct_answer.text: There are 9642627 teachers in the classroom. So, each teacher has 2 lessons per day, and they use the whiteboard in each lesson, so in a day, they use it 2 x 32 = 64 times. The answer is: 64.
